seo_page_description: Civic signage programs have the unique ability to transform a visitor’s arrival and wayfinding experience through an often-times confusing urban experience. Civic master plan signage, placemaking, and wayfinding systems bring clarity and simplicity to both vehicular navigation and pedestrian navigat
grid_image_description: City of Dana Point wood wayfinding sign with hills and sunset in the background
overview:
Bringing clarity and unity to the civic environment

Civic signage programs have the unique ability to transform a visitor’s arrival and wayfinding experience through an often-times confusing urban experience. Civic master plan signage, placemaking, and wayfinding systems bring clarity and simplicity to both vehicular navigation and pedestrian navigation, as well as adding a strong identity and character to a community. Our design approach merges a deep understanding of the user journey and a strategic understanding of place to create a unique civic approach for our clients.

RSM Design works closely with city councils, officials, public outreach committees, and municipal boards around the country to help visually communicate each community’s unique amenities through creative civic signage and wayfinding programs.

seo_page_description: RSM Design understands the importance of complementing the architecture and artwork of galleries and cultural centers with museum signage, interpretive graphics, and simple wayfinding design. This is done by balancing clarity and function with a refined sensitivity to detail and craft.
grid_image_description: Ad Ex large identity signage in front of their building, illuminated at night
overview:
Signage that respects the mission and value

RSM Design understands the importance of complementing the architecture and artwork of galleries and cultural centers with museum signage, interpretive graphics, and simple wayfinding design. This is done by balancing clarity and function with a refined sensitivity to detail and craft.

Well-designed wayfinding systems add value to one’s experience within museum architecture, all combined with a sensitivity to design that does not distract from the overall viewing and interactive experience. Through a refined and empathetic approach to each project, RSM Design creates an integrated brand identity and signage system that articulates the vision of the museum design and its patrons.

RSM Design’s experiences range from comprehensive campus wayfinding master plans to dormitory signage and student union buildings, all the
grid_image_description: Children's medical center signage and interior design details
overview:
Identities and wayfinding for campuses and institutions

RSM Design has worked with institutions nationally on campus placemaking to enhance the educational and engaging experiences for students, faculty, and visitors. RSM Design’s experiences range from comprehensive campus wayfinding master plans to dormitory signage and student union buildings, all the while developing placemaking solutions that guide and inform the student community.

By fully understanding both the institution and the complexities of large scale campus design and the need for flexibility within any signage program, the team develops an integrated brand identity, utilizing signage and wayfinding programs that enrich the quality and value of the campus experience.

seo_page_description: Environmental graphics have the power to transform the dining experience of foodhalls into an eclectic and enjoyable destination where friends and families come together to enjoy the entertaining aspects of eating out and discovering new and exciting culinary offerings. RSM Design has many years of
grid_image_description: The Hangar food hall in Long Beach with open tables and multiple tenants
overview:
Designing a branded experience

Environmental graphics have the power to transform the dining experience of foodhalls into an eclectic and enjoyable destination where friends and families come together to enjoy the entertaining aspects of eating out and discovering new and exciting culinary offerings. RSM Design has many years of experience creating eclectic signage and graphics programs for foodhalls, public markets, restaurants, and cafes, all the while taking cues from the community and the unique mix of participating tenants.

With experience in brand identity, tenant design, signage criteria, and specialty graphics, the RSM Design team understands how to balance individual tenant brand identities with the overall sense of place of the foodhall brand experience. The goal when creating foodhall signage and specialty graphics is to heighten the communal dining experience by creating diversely unique experiences as rich and varied as the culinary choices being offered.

seo_page_description: RSM Design creates identities, wayfinding strategies and design programs that address the unique challenges and opportunities within the healthcare sector. Whether it be for a hospital campus, wellness center, or education campus, RSM Design begins with the goal in mind, developing a meticulous and
grid_image_description: University of Pacific waiting room healthcare signage
overview:
Signage & Wayfinding Design for Hospitals, Healthcare & Wellness Centers

All healthcare facilities require signage & wayfinding to help patients feel secure in arrival, and exit without a hitch. Medical centers are typically intimidating to new visitors who have enough on their mind. Wayfinding for healthcare facilities direct traffic with clear messaging and a touch of delight which lightens the day for an anxious patient or visitor.

Exterior hospital signage includes entrance monument signs, wayfinding systems and interactive design programs that are legible, reassuring, and joyful. Interior healthcare wayfinding design seamlessly leads the visitor through the medical facility. Hospital wayfinding must define a system of hierarchy within messaging and even reassure the visitors they're still going the right direction. Healthcare facility signage can improve a patients experience while saving staff from becoming visitor guides.

Starting with meticulous research, we plan & strategize for the needs of each Hospital, Medical Center, or Clinic. Through interviews & workshops our team steps into the shoes of patients, family & staff to design an experience fit for everyone. This planning leads to signage for hospitals that is both functional and innovative. Patients & visitors feel a sense of comfort so their minds can stay at ease.

Read our Article on Healthcare Signage Design

With special attention to colors, materials, and finishes, RSM Design’s hospitality design team ensures that the atmospher
grid_image_description: Virgin Hotel monument signage at the entrance driveway to the hotel
overview:
Wayfinding & Signage Design for Hospitality, Hotels & Resorts

Within the hospitality sector, environmental graphic design plays a vital role in connecting the guest to a sense of place through thoughtfully integrated and refined details. Architectural signage is used throughout hotels and resorts to provide guests with direction as well as a sense of place. With special attention to colors, materials, and finishes, RSM Design’s hospitality wayfinding signage design team ensures that the atmosphere of the hotel or resort leaves lasting memories. Our work leaves hospitality guests informed and intrigued while connecting to the brand voice & vibe.

RSM Design contributes with hospitality brand identity, wayfinding programs, identity signage, and in-room amenity details such as print collateral and guest products. Whether a coastal resort, a bustling urban hotel, or boutique motel designed to delight our studio’s understanding of the guest experience enables us to craft unique solutions that emerge as a memorable experience worth noting.

They can also elevate a project to the international stage to bring tourism or recognition for the host co
grid_image_description: Oxigeno Retail building facade signage in the background as motorcycle rides in front
overview:
Design with regional sensitivity that understands historical and cultural contexts

‍

The cultural contexts of international projects work at multiple levels. They can be influenced by the regional needs of the communities they serve, tapping into local influences and histories. They can also elevate a project to the international stage to bring tourism or recognition for the host country.

RSM Design has deep experience working with international clients in a variety of project types. Our reach spans Asia, Europe, the Middle East, and North, Central and South America in over 40 countries. Each project speaks to the local heritage by integrating wayfinding design and brand identity into the overall spatial experience.

seo_page_description: RSM Design takes an informed approach when working with mixed use projects to achieve a balance of commercial viability with the aesthetic and functional needs that drive the placemaking, signage and wayfinding design. The overall experience creates a unique sense of place that differentiates these
grid_image_description: Jack London Square restroom signage directional outdoors
overview:
Branded environments & placemaking graphics that create memorable destinations

Mixed-use projects provide a variety of residential and commercial opportunities within a shared building or district. To achieve a balance of commercial viability, aesthetic beauty and functional needs RSM Design starts with the end in mind. Mixed-use development requires thorough research & collaboration between consultants and stakeholders. Mixed-use signage and wayfinding design creates walkable communities for people to live, work and play. The overall experience creates a unique feeling and security that differentiates our projects from other mixed-use design.

Mixed use developments have a variety of uses and audiences so the primary goal of RSM Design is understanding the needs of the local community. Within a single building we help retail shops attract customers while maintaining an intimate home for residents in apartments above. Large scale mixed-use projects like 5th & Broadway in Nashville become urban villages that require a clear master plan wayfinding systems along with unique moments of graphic placemaking signage or murals. Retail, office and residential developments provide creative opportunities to elevate mixed-use environmental graphic design from a static brand identity to a community that thrives and takes the space as their own.

RSM Design works with multi-disciplinary teams to achieve comfort, quality, an

overview:
Welcome home

Whether it’s an urban mixed-use multifamily residential building with retail or a sprawling suburban master planned community, residential community signage design is all about creating a welcoming feeling of coming home. RSM Design works with multi-disciplinary teams to achieve comfort, quality, and consistency throughout the community experience. Environmental graphic design and wayfinding is just one tool of many for expressing the brand identity through an integrated sense of place.

From the user’s first impression of the site, placemaking connects residents to their homes through thoughtful and high-quality details. Identity signage, wayfinding design, and neighborhood monumentation all contribute to the atmosphere of the community and residential neighborhood.

seo_page_description: RSM Design works closely with cities, communities, and developers to connect people with outdoor spaces through the creative use of park signage. In these spaces, the most intriguing and dynamic design solutions reveal themselves with a thorough understanding of the local environment and surrounding
grid_image_description: Park walkways, benches, and bikes with greenhouse in the distance
overview:
Wayfinding Signage Design & Placemaking for parks & outdoor spaces

RSM Design works closely with cities, communities, and developers to connect people with outdoor spaces through creative park wayfinding signage. Working with architects, landscape architects and planners we implement signage systems that guide visitors through parks and urban environments with ease and confidence. In these spaces, the most dynamic design solutions reveal themselves with a thorough understanding of the local environment and surrounding cultural context.

Designing signage for parks presents a unique set of opportunities. With the high volume of people and activities, it is important that the signage systems are legible and clear, while still feeling connected to the brand & surrounding area. For visitors step by step guides to historic sites, photo opportunities, or planned events become a part of the wayfinding & signage design. Local stories that add character and relevance are integrated to give the park soul and spark visitor intrigue. A curated and layered environmental graphic design approach to park design brings out a distinct sense of meaning and purpose, both to the park and the overall community.

seo_page_description: RSM Design has 20+ years of experience designing wayfinding signage, graphic systems, and supergraphics in parking garages of all sizes. Interior and exterior parking garage wayfinding signage and identity.
grid_image_description: Pacific City in Huntington Beach parking garage wayfinding signage and specialty graphics.
overview:
Wayfinding signage design & specialty graphics for parking structures & garages

Parking garage design introduces the branded environment, leads visitors into the project and back out. In many cases it is the first and last experience a visitor has. Structured parking design includes wayfinding signage and specialty graphics for vehicles and pedestrians. Through bold colors, branded patterning, and clear wayfinding signage complex parking structures become easier to navigate while enhancing the atmosphere. RSM Design is experienced in creating a concise & delightful arrival for guests that seamlessly flows into the project.

seo_page_description: RSM Design works with multi-disciplinary teams to achieve comfort, quality, and consistency throughout the community experience. Environmental graphic design and wayfinding express the brand identity through an integrated sense of place.
grid_image_description: Tustin Legacy monument signage illuminated at night with cars driving by in foreground
overview:
Wayfinding & Signage Design for Residential & Masterplan Communities

Suburban master planned communities and residential community signage design is all about creating a welcome feeling of coming home. RSM Design works with multi-disciplinary teams to achieve comfort, quality, and consistency throughout the community experience. Environmental graphic design and wayfinding express the brand identity through an integrated sense of place.
From the user’s first impression to the lasting memories that are built over time, placemaking connects residents to their homes through thoughtful and high-quality details. Identity signage, wayfinding design, and neighborhood monumentation all contribute to the atmosphere of the community and residential neighborhood.
RSM Design’s portfolio often includes an integrated approach to temporary and permanent signage. The initial phasing of residential projects include sales and welcome centers, builder signs for model homes and temporary wayfinding. Permanent elements include logo and brand design, community monumentation, street signs, park and trail signage, and amenity buildings. Our approach fosters trust by prioritizing continuity and quality across all brand touch points to build long-term relationships with buyers.

Signage Wayfinding & Placemaking for Shopping Malls & Retail Repositioning

RSM Design is highly experienced in the dynamic and evolving nature of the retail experience, developing brand identity, wayfinding programs, and specialty graphics for mixed-use environments, lifestyle centers, malls, and individual tenants. The architectural graphics and signage elevates the guest experiences within these environments, resulting in immersive shopping and entertainment experiences.

In addition to an optimal and creative tenant mix, the thoughtful and innovative application of environmental graphics can successfully attract and retain shoppers. RSM Design’s goal when crafting signage and graphics is to translate a retail brand’s experience in delightful and surprising ways.

seo_page_description: We seek to enhance the scientific workplace and spaces so scientific discovery can flourish. a unique perspective to the Life Science built environment with our extensive experience across market sectors and project types such as biotechnology, innovation districts, research & development.
grid_image_description: Clean letters mounted to canopy with reflective face and large orange letter returns
overview:
Environments that foster growth and community for biotech, life sciences and technology

RSM Design brings a unique perspective to the Life Science built environment with our extensive experience across market sectors and project types such as biotechnology, innovation districts, research & development, large scale mixed-use campuses, health & wellness, workplace and retail. Our interdisciplinary and synergistic approach includes crafting and implementing the brand experience from identity development to wayfinding programs and placemaking design to create connection and collaboration between people.

We seek to enhance the scientific workplace and spaces so discovery can flourish. Our design process first seeks to discover the shared vision and purpose of each project. The strategy is defined and vision translated in varied and dynamic creative solutions that are then further developed through collaboration and synergy. Our process driven approach allows us to support the innovation of educators, health advocates, corporations and governments as they create scientific advancements to improve our lives.

Our experienced Life Science Practice team includes Kyle Richter, Christy Montgomery, and Andrea Guzman combining their expertise in brand development, large scale workplace and civic campus planning and healthcare.

A holistic entertainment experience that bonds fans and visitors

The dynamic and engaging nature of sports and entertainment design is accented by the need for strong and clear signage and wayfinding programs. Architectural graphics and signage design become part of a holistic entertainment experience that bonds fans and visitors to the teams and places they love. Whether it’s a stadium design, casino signage, arena wayfinding, or outdoor sports complexes, our team captures the spirit of a place and engages the user in fun and surprising ways.

With careful attention to successfully carrying the brand identity throughout the signage design, wayfinding program, and environmental graphics, RSM Design utilizes a user-centered approach when designing for sports and entertainment venues.

seo_page_description: RSM Design enhances the master plan of a project to unify the landscape design and architecture through branded elements, placemaking, and fixturing to create an overall streetscape design that is in harmony with the vision of the project. We build complete palettes for the streetscape with the goal
grid_image_description: Outdoor market at Victoria Gardens with identity signage in background
overview:
Creating an active street

RSM Design enhances the master plan of a project to unify the landscape design and architecture through branded elements, placemaking, and fixturing to create an overall streetscape design that is in harmony with the vision of the project. We build complete palettes for the streetscape with the goal of being the connective link between all the different disciplines.

We create brand-defining elements for a city or project to help give the streetscape an enlivened character that has both consistency and variety. We work through the approach of a 10 by 10 philosophy where every 10 feet there are 10 things to activate your senses, such as a restaurant or cafe, a piece of art, or decorative paving to help activate and bring delight to a streetscape.

seo_page_description: Transportation wayfinding signage is a carefully planned navigation system that is easy for visitors to understand and follow. Transit wayfinding design uses clear communication to direct visitors through airports, train stations, subway systems, bus stations and trolleys.
grid_image_description: San Ysidro port of entry overhead view with cars lined up and sunset in the background
overview:
Transportation wayfinding systems designed to guide visitors confidently to their destination

Transit wayfinding design includes airports, train stations, subway systems, border crossings, buses and trolleys. Transportation signage is a carefully planned wayfinding navigation system that is easy for visitors to understand and follow. Color and sign design consistency gives riders a sense of security and confidence they will be guided at all decision points. The final and most important part of effective transport wayfinding design is information clarity & hierarchy. These are some of the elements working in unison to break down complex transportation projects into bite size bread crumbs for increased rider satisfaction.

Connecting multiple modes of transit makes it accessible to everyone. Train station wayfinding should feed into bus station signage, and back when travel is reversed. Wayfinding maps become a tool to display districts, routes, or travel connections. RSM Design works with cities, committees, and stakeholders to develop public transportation systems that reflect the surrounding community while addressing all traveler needs.

overview:
Wayfinding & Signage Design for Boardwalks, Harbors & Waterfronts

RSM Design has collaborated on some of the most iconic waterfronts in the world. Our team has developed the brand, signage and placemaking elements that create layered, informational and playful experiences along the journey. 

We believe that public places that engage the water create deep connections and meaning for the communities they touch as well as all who visit. Our team has added to the revitalization, joy and soul of waterfronts from Morocco to Miami.

grid_image_description: Pizza Hut corporate headquarters interior specialty graphics
overview:
Successful signage programs for corporate campuses

RSM Design has worked closely with large corporations and development teams to create identity signage and wayfinding programs for a number of office developments around the country. We craft office and corporate masterplan solutions by building on the legacy, heritage, and culture of the development and company, creating signage programs that are innovative, timeless, and authentic to the mission of the organization. The design team integrates brand identity and wayfinding signage programs that serve to meet the needs of both visitors and everyday users.

Successful signage programs for office developments adds clarity to the guest experience by identifying amenities in a clear and logical manner. Wayfinding signage and interactive map designs lead workers to cafes, public gathering spaces, parking, and other on-site amenities, thereby increasing the overall value of the campus. The integration of environmental graphics and placemaking features create moments of delight in the everyday experiences by providing workers a strong and enjoyable connection to the work environment.
